name: Kaki Fry
recipeInstructions: 2. Rinse the oysters in a bowl of salty water, removing any sand. Put on a paper towle to dry.
4. Put the flour in a bowl and add the beaten egg. Mix until smooth. Add water until the batter has the consistency of light cream.
5. Put the flour on a shallow dish or plate.
6. Put the breadcrumbs on a tray.
7. Flour the oysters, dip them in the batter, then coat with breadcrumbs.
8. Deep fry for 3 minutes, turning once.
